    • Method Detail

      • getManualEntryFlag

        char getManualEntryFlag()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if manual entries are allowed. (R/3-field: T685A-KMANU)

      • isChangeOfRateAllowed

        boolean isChangeOfRateAllowed()
        Returns:
        true if a manual change of the condition rate is allowed. (R/3-field: T685A-KAEND_BTR)

      • isChangeOfValueAllowed

        boolean isChangeOfValueAllowed()
        Returns:
        true if a manual change of the condition value is allowed. (R/3-field: T685A-KAEND_WRT)

      • isChangeOfConversionFactorAllowed

        boolean isChangeOfConversionFactorAllowed()
        Returns:
        true if a manual change of the numerator and denominator for quantity conversion is allowed. This functionality is not supported yet. (R/3-field: T685A-KAEND_UFK)

      • isChangeOfCalculationTypeAllowed

        boolean isChangeOfCalculationTypeAllowed()
        Returns:
        true if a manual change of the calculation rule is allowed. This functionality is not supported yet. (R/3-field: T685A-KAEND_RCH)

      • isDeletionAllowed

        boolean isDeletionAllowed()
        Returns:
        true if a manual deletion is allowed. (R/3-field: T685A-KAEND_LOE)

      • isHeaderCondition

        boolean isHeaderCondition()
        Returns:
        true if a pricing condition can be maintained on the pricing document level. This functionality is not supported yet. (R/3-field: T685A-KKOPF)

      • isItemCondition

        boolean isItemCondition()
        Returns:
        true if a pricing condition can be maintained on the pricing item level. (R/3-field: T685A-KPOSI)

      • getRoundingRule

        char getRoundingRule()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if rounding is performed. (R/3-field: T685A-TXPRF)

      • getConditionCategory

        char getConditionCategory()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the condition category. (R/3-field: T685A-KNTYP)

      • getConditionClass

        char getConditionClass()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the condition class. (R/3-field: T685A-KOAID)

      • isCurrencyConversion

        boolean isCurrencyConversion()
        Returns:
        true if currency conversion is performed for the condition value.

      • getCalculationType

        char getCalculationType()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the calculation type. (R/3-field: T685A-KRECH)

      • isGroupCondition

        boolean isGroupCondition()
        Returns:
        true if I am a group conditiontype. The corresponding functionality is not supported yet. (R/3-field: T685A-KGRPE)

      • isConditionUpdate

        boolean isConditionUpdate()
        Returns:
        true if condition values are accumulated. The functionality in only supported in the R/3 system. (R/3-field: T685A-KOUPD)

      • isVariantCondition

        boolean isVariantCondition()
        Returns:
        true if I am a variant conditiontype. (R/3-field: T685A-KVARC)

      • isInterCompanyBilling

        boolean isInterCompanyBilling()
        Returns:
        true if I am a conditiontype for intercompany invoices. The corresponding functionality is not supported yet. (R/3-field: T685A-KFKIV)

      • isAccrual

        boolean isAccrual()
        Returns:
        true if I am a conditiontype where accruals should be posted. The corresponding functionality is only supported in the R/3 system. (R/3-field: T685A-KRUEK)

      • isInvoiceList

        boolean isInvoiceList()
        Returns:
        true if I am a conditiontype for intercompany invoices. The corresponding functionality is not supported yet. (R/3-field: T685A-KRELI)

      • getPlusMinus

        char getPlusMinus()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies the allowed sign(s) of the condition rate. (R/3-field: T685A-KNEGA)

      • getPricingDateFlag

        char getPricingDateFlag()

      • isConditionForDuplication

        boolean isConditionForDuplication()
        Returns:
        true if the conditiontype is marked for duplication within bill of materials.

      • isConditionForCumulation

        boolean isConditionForCumulation()
        Returns:
        true if the conditiontype is marked for cumulation within bill of materials.
